title: Ep. 665 A Timeline of the Biggest Scandal in Modern American History
description:
In this episode I walk through the timeline of the most disturbing government spying scandal in modern American history: The Obamagate spying scandal.
 
Here’s an excellent timeline of the events surrounding the Obamagate spying scandal.
 
CNN reported months ago about foreign efforts to spy on the Trump team.
 
Was Donald Trump spied on directly?
 
Why did this British spy chief step down after Trump was elected president?
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
